description: Data Source metrics grouped by the values in an annotation applied to the data sources

targets.rawSql:
SELECT sum(ingressBytes)
FROM "deltafi"."complete_deltafiles"
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotations['${annotation}'] IN (${annotationValue}))
UNION ALL
SELECT sum(ingressBytes)
FROM "deltafi"."errors"
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotations['${annotation}'] IN (${annotationValue}))

options.content: Data Sources Grouped by ${annotation}

targets.rawSql:
SELECT sum(files) as files
FROM "deltafi"."complete_deltafiles"
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotations['${annotation}'] IN (${annotationValue}))
UNION ALL 
SELECT count() as files
FROM "deltafi"."errors"
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotations['${annotation}'] IN (${annotationValue}))

SELECT time, dataSource || ' (' || if(empty(annotationValue),'None',annotationValue) || ')' AS annotationValue, bytes " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, sum(ingressBytes) AS bytes 
FROM deltafi."complete_deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue}))
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT dataSource, if(empty(annotationValue),'(none)',annotationValue) AS annotationValue, value
FROM(
SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, sum(ingressBytes) value 
FROM "deltafi"."complete_deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue}))  
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10)

SELECT dataSource, if(empty(annotationValue),'(none)',annotationValue) AS annotationValue, value
FROM(
SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, sum(files) value 
FROM "deltafi"."complete_deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue}))  
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10)

SELECT time, dataSource || ' (' || if(empty(annotationValue),'None',annotationValue) || ')' AS annotationValue, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, sum(files) AS values 
FROM deltafi."complete_deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue}))
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT dataSource || ' ' || annotationValue AS annotationValue, values " " FROM
(SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, sum(egressedFiles) AS values 
FROM deltafi."complete_deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue)
WHERE values > 0

SELECT time, dataSource || ' (' || if(empty(annotationValue),'None',annotationValue) || ')' AS annotationValue, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, sum(egressedFiles) AS values 
FROM deltafi."complete_deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT dataSource || ' ' || annotationValue AS annotationValue, values " " FROM
(SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, count() AS values 
FROM deltafi."errors" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue)
WHERE values > 0

SELECT time, dataSource || ' (' || if(empty(annotationValue),'None',annotationValue) || ')' AS annotationValue, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, count() AS values 
FROM deltafi."errors" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT dataSource || ' ' || annotationValue AS annotationValue, values " " FROM
(SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, sum(filteredFiles) AS values 
FROM deltafi."complete_deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue)
WHERE values > 0

SELECT time, dataSource || ' (' || if(empty(annotationValue),'None',annotationValue) || ')' AS annotationValue, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, sum(filteredFiles) AS values 
FROM deltafi."complete_deltafiles" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS tag, sum(ingressBytes) as values
FROM "deltafi"."complete_deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and (dataSource IN (${dataSource})) AND ( tag IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, tag
ORDER BY values DESC

SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotation, sum(files) as files
FROM "deltafi"."complete_deltafiles" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND (dataSource IN (${dataSource})) AND ( annotation IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, annotation
ORDER BY files DESC

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT dataSource FROM complete_deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
list.label: Data Source
list.name: dataSource
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dataSource FROM complete_deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT arrayJoin(mapKeys(annotations)) AS keys FROM complete_deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) )
list.label: Annotation
list.name: annotation
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT arrayJoin(mapKeys(annotations)) AS keys FROM complete_deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) )

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue FROM complete_deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) )
list.label: Annotation Value
list.name: annotationValue
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue FROM complete_deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( dataSource IN (${dataSource} ) )

title: Data Source by Annotation
